name: Crookston Aviation
about: Crookston Aviation, part of the University of Minnesota, Crookston, offers a unique and comprehensive aviation program that prepares students for a variety of careers beyond traditional commercial aviation. Since 1965, our program has specialized in dual-function degrees, combining strong aviation fundamentals with coursework in law enforcement, agriculture, or natural resources. This integrated approach equips graduates for roles such as agriculture aviation, law enforcement aviation, and natural resource aviation. Our students benefit from specialized training, including Emergency Maneuver Trainingâ„¢, and use of aircraft like the Cessna 172 and Bellanca Decathlon. With a focus on practical skills and a supportive, close-knit campus environment, Crookston Aviation is dedicated to producing well-rounded and skilled aviation professionals. Let us help you take to the skies and achieve your flying career goals.
